message: I was also getting this error, but I updated to R 4.2.2 and then installed all of the latest packages from [https://cran.microsoft.com](https://cran.microsoft.com) on Windows 10 and the error went away. Hopefully updating all of your packages would also work from any mirror on any platform.
message_html: I was also getting this error, but I updated to R 4.2.2 and then installed all of the latest packages from https://cran.microsoft.com on Windows 10 and the error went away. Hopefully updating all of your packages would also work from any mirror on any platform.
